short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps with making decisions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decider is a versatile Chrome extension designed to assist you in making decisions with ease. With a range of handy tools at your fingertips, this extension offers a coin flip, dice roll, magic 8 ball, and random number generator all in one convenient package.

Need a quick flip of a coin to settle a dilemma? Use the built-in coin flip feature to get an instant heads or tails result. For more complex decisions, roll the dice and let chance guide your choice. Choose between rolling one, two, or three dice to suit your needs.

When uncertainty lingers, consult the mystical Magic 8 Ball for guidance. Simply ask a question and receive a cryptic, yet enlightening, response to help steer your decision-making process.

For randomizing needs beyond coins and dice, the random number generator is at your service. Specify a range or let it decide for you, and instantly obtain a random number to add an element of chance to your decision-making.

Decider is a reliable companion for those moments when you could use an impartial hand in making choices. With its intuitive interface and diverse range of decision-making tools, this extension streamlines the process, bringing fun and convenience to your decision-making endeavors.

Make decisions with confidence and a touch of randomness. Install Decider now and let chance guide your way!

Note: Decider is for entertainment purposes only and should not be considered as a substitute for sound judgment or professional advice.
